desc: We had a fabulous time there especially on our last night when we haf dinner on the 22nd floor, the view was amazing & Amin Adam & Sheila did everything to make our last night very memorable . Would highly recommend the hotel, very close to everything & all staff were very helpful.

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Nimali was great!
desc: Great hotel room - Nimali was fantastic with the room service. Helpful at reception with a speedy checkout option available. Got the breakfast on site, lots of choice. Recommend for your next stay in steamy singapore

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Stay @ Peninsula Excelsior
desc: Enjoyed our stay, the staff everyone in general but in particular to mention a few names - Shanti Krish, Amin Adam , Aya , Mr Zahur and the little girl Shoon in the dining area. Nice to talk to, always smiling & helpful

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: I will stay here again
desc: The Peninsula Excelsior Hotel offered a very pleasant experience for our extended stay in Singapore. It is a good central location to any and all attractions. I was very impressed with the size of the room and it was well maintained daily by the staff. My only concern was that the bed was a little hard for my liking, but upon mentioning this to the staff at the front desk, they promptly brought up a mattress topper. Our stay included the daily breakfast buffet. The selection of items was very good and included an omelette bar and fresh fruit and salad options. I definitely was impressed with how well the restaurant was organized and managed. Everything was consistently being refilled and kept meticulous clean. All the staff were very courteous, pleasant and attentive! Always

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Staff are very friendly 🥰
desc: Very nice hotel , close to everything specially staff are friendly and very helpful , especially Ms. Sheila at the reception assisting us with a smile and very patience to answer all my questions 🥰

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Great stay
desc: Our stay was very pleasant their reaction to our requests and needs were actioned immediately with great professionalism. Our room was comfortable and clean and had everything we needed.we would like to extend our gratitude to Jonelyn and Ahtuan for their kindness .

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Lovely
desc: Lovely hotel. I love the service, the cleanliness, the pool, the room. Also very thoughtful giving me room that is kids friendly and so sweet of giving me birthday cake! I will def stay here again ♥️ cheers!!

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Location & Staff make this place a winner
desc: This hotel is centrally located and is walking distance to many shopping malls, eateries and tourist attractions. The staff were all friendly and helpful. The view from the 22nd floor (Sky Lounge) was amazing along with the ever pleasant & helpful Lana Wang who kept us hydrated with gin or tea.. We will definitely be back!

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Superb view, very good taste the meal and unforgettable hospitality
desc: Our sky dining experience in Coleman Cafe is very wonderfull. Good taste laksa and satay, superb view and ambience and many bonus for free. Thank you Shiela and June for your warm hospitality. Can't wait to visit here again

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Our stay at Peninsular Excelsior Hotel, Singapore
desc: We had an awesome stay at this home from home hotel. We stayed there for 3+ weeks following my knee surgery in a marine view room with Club Room access. The care we received from the General Manager. (Mr William Tan) downwards was quite unimaginable. Anne and the Sky Family of Aya, Chef Lee, Sheila, Ton (steward) and Patrick were amazing, efficient and caring. Our room maid Nimali was exceptional. The room was spotless and 100% in a ready state for us whenever we returned from our outings. We didn’t lack for anything. The hors d’oeuvres varied every evening, and we had free flow beverages of our choice. This hotel is conveniently located almost next door to Funan Mall with its many food outlets. It is close to Raffles City, Suntec Mall and Marina Bay with its huge range of

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Singapore for a week
desc: The Service in hotel was very good. Special thanks to Siela and her colleague Patrick. These great guys made our evening on hotel Rooftop unforgettable. We used also 2 pools regularly. From hotel you can discover Songapore easily

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: 11 days getaway in Singapore
desc: The receptionist on that time was not that really accommodating. He asked me to wait until 14:00 hours because there’s no available room yet. Then I told him, I’ll just wait at the lobby just in front of his desk and he can call me once there is an available room. It’s past 14:00 but still no call from him, but he managed to check in other guest. I approached him again then advised me to wait for couple of minutes. The rest is ok at the Hotel, the housekeeping has done a great job and she regularly changed my beddings after every three days. In case you meet her, her name is Thanaletchumy assigned at the 11th floor of Excelsior Tower.

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Could be better
desc: Great location close to MRT and shopping malls with lots of food options. Hotel itself Is in need of an upgrade for the money spent It was OK. Furniture old bathroom looks newish however the shower door does not close properly. Shower Head is tiny and the WC is not comfortable and the cistern is too big and hits your back. No water when we checked in although this was rectified by housekeeping over the next couple of nights. Two pools the waterfall pool overtaken by kids very hard to relax with screaming kids should have dedicated kids hours.

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Great location but missed the feel of staying in a 4 star hotel due to poor F&B
desc: I was on a business trip and I loved the ease of movement from the hotel to the city center and other locations, as the hotel is in the heart of the city. However, the food was a disappointment, could hardly enjoy any good vegetarian food during the stay. The F&B manager (missed the name) was super helpful and managed to offer at least some vegetarian food when I requested. The disappointments were - no turndown amenities, no welcome drinks, or baggage assistance when I checked in (I traveled solo and stayed for 5 nights!), also the rooms need a major touch-up and renovation as there was a terrible smell in the room and in the corridors. Not going again for sure!

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Excellent location
desc: Hotel probably could do with a refurb however the location is excellent and the staff are more than helpful. Room was clean and a reasonable size with a magnificent view across to Marina Bay Sands. Two pool , the pool out the side is quieter. Could do with an internal bar.

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Fabulous food
desc: Went to Coleman's Cafe for lunch with the family. The local nasi padang was a good spread, authentic and delicious. A special shout-out to Jesinda and Kaur for their warm and friendly, personal service!

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Lunch at Coleman @peninsula excelsior
desc: Went to Coleman on the fifth floor, pleasant encounter with jesminda Kaur, Food rating excellent and it was a memorable dining experience. Will be visiting this venue in the very near future... Highly recommended.

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Sky Lounge
desc: I went to sky lounge on Saturday when there happened to be National Day Parade rehearsals and had the greatest time with my friends and family and that’s because besides having a really breathtaking spot for dine-in we were warmly assisted by Ms Sheila and Mr Jun such a warm friendly people and they made sure we had a good time and ate well.really amazing at what they do. They are definitely one of the reasons I would go back there again :)

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Unforgettable experience
desc: My first and unforgettable stay in singapore. First of all location is superB very accessible to all places since its also central. Shout out to one of the front office staff kendra who gave us a perfect view in out room for our stay. She was really attentive with our concerns and handled it well. Def going back with that kind of service.

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Can not recommend this hotel
desc: Looks ok from the outside BUT this is a tired old facility. We were booked for 3 nights & arrived after a long flight. Originally in the old tower I was appalled when I entered the room. The room stank of moisture/ mouldy smell, fittings / furniture old, very hard bed. The only way I could breath was thru a mask. We crashed for a few hours & woke early am. It was difficult to breathe with the level of humidity in that room. Throat & chest not feeling good. I was prepared to move hotels. We went to the Concierge desk in the wee hours. No apology but the staff were accommodating & gave us a key to look at a room in the newer tower. It was much better. The air was breathable, bed a bit softer and over all felt ok. We stayed for the rest of our booking but this incident did spoil

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Wonderful staff
desc: Met a super friendly staff called Lifeng when i was first time in Peninsula Excelsior Hotel. She really makes me had a pleasant stay and warm my day of her super lovely sweet welcoming smile. Her excellent services keep me returning stay. I'm proud of the hotel that have such an wonderful staff like her.

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Great hotel , great service , wonderful staff
desc: Lovely sea view room , great service from house keeping . Special thanks to Kenny Tan for his kindness in perfecting our staycation. Beautiful sky lounge with wonderful staff especially Anne & Aya. Like the amenities in the club room. Will be our No.1 choice for future family staycation.

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Good location but service need to be improved
desc: The hotel is located in City Centre, an extremely convenient location which you can get to the MRT and bus station to else where in the town within a 2-3 mins walk. This time, I was staying in the premium room located on the highest floor of the building. The Front Office staff was great as she knew that we are travelling in a family and she has assigned nearby rooms for us. I have stayed 4 nights in the hotel. The room was nice, spacious and well renovated. However, I have to point out that the housekeeping and the operator were not well performed. When I just entered my room, hairs were found all over the bath tub. The washbasin was not well cleaned and you can clearly saw the toothpaste were still there. Every night when i back to my room, I need to reach the operator

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Excellant customer service from Ms Anne and Ms Aya
desc: The hotel staff, Anne and Aya is very helpful and courteous during my stay. They make my stay hassle free. Even the air conditioning is too cold, Anne manage to get the hotel technician to rectify. I will definately come to this hotel again with the excellant and wanderful service rendered by your 2 staff.

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Great service and personal treatment
desc: The staff in the Executive Sky lounge were excellent, friendly, professional and highly responsive to our needs, it felt like a real treat. Sheila on reception and Patrick in the bar were super helpful and friendly. I would thoroughly recommend the Executive Club rooms and staying in the Peninsula Excelsior Hotel. Thank you

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Great location
desc: Very friendly staff especially Anne, Sheila with a special mention of Aya and Patrick. We throughly enjoyed our 5 days spent at the Peninsula Excelsior Hotel and would recommend the Club level to any travellers- a great location and view from the Sky lounge with a free light show every night. Squire family, Australia

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: A expressing hotel
desc: This hotel is much better than expected, and the service is very humanized and feels right at home. The reception staff and room attendants were very touching. Attendant Xue Ling was very friendly and courteous. the disadvantage is that there are few power sockets beside the beds.

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Fantastic
desc: Fantastic hotel and amenities especially if you upgrade to club longue access which has a beautiful view of MBS, complimentary supply of drinks and evenong snacks . Staff are smiling, friendly and ready to help.

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Disappointed overnight stay
desc: We have been staying in this hotel every time we travel to Amsterdam but we will not be coming back here. The room was very tired , the TV didn't work and the bathroom was very small and tired. For the $300 cost per night it was overpriced.

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: The amazing nasi padang experience
desc: The nasi padang buffet lunch is a must. The restaurant is spacious and the buffet is nicely set out with name tags of dishes clearly displayed. The variety of Indonesian dishes from main dishes to desserts certainly makes one loss for choice. The beef cheek rendang is a mouth melting experience due to its tender texture. Other dishes are equally tasty like the lontong , fried fish and sambal squid. Try sampling a little to get the feel of spiciness before you dive into the dishes. Service is exceptionally good with standby waiters eager to takeaway your crockery when you have finished eating. Special mention is to made to Albert the food and beverage director who is on hand to answer queries or if one is stuck with using the ice machine he 's there to help. Ava is the other head

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Delay Check In
desc: The check in process was quiet slow. Even after 3pm i still have not get my room yet however DM Melvin was very helpful, and make the guest understand while he is guiding the staff at the counter. Not forgetting the FOM Jumie who gives instructions to the staff on what to do and to prioritise those guests with child or old couple to have the rooms ready and make sure operation runs smoothly.

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Worst check-in ever.
desc: Just checked in at the Peninsula Excelsior Hotel. It took 39 minutes from the moment we entered the check-in queue at the lobby till we walked away with the keys for our room. More to come, hopefully with better news as this wasn’t a great start.

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: New system, long wait
desc: The hotel is changing to a new system and that is why makes us queuing up for so long and makes us waiting for the room till in the evening. However, the staff was good and provide our needs. The staff is Samsani, Jennifer, Shahira, Amin, Jessie, Aya, Ismail & Liufang. Excellent for their service. 👏👏👏👏👏

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Smooth experience
desc: Our stay was smooth and pleasant. Jonelyn was very accommodating and made sure we get the best room possible considering our requests. The birthday cakes they gave us was also a very nice touch. We will recommend for sure! Thanks for the great stay!

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Appreciation
desc: Senior Duty Manager Shankrish helped me and my family to get rooms beside each other for an ideal stay. Check in went smooth, we enjoyed a tastefull breakfast, and overall had a great time at the Peninsula Excelsior. Thank you Shankrish.

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Good location and staff
desc: Positives, the location and the staff. Negative, the bathrooms. Everything else, average. Great location close to food, transport and shopping. Staff did a good job in all aspects, even when dealing with some very rude and ignorant patrons. Friendly, and helpful. The hotel is across the board just average, especially for the money it cost to stay. The lobby and shared areas were nice enough but there must be a difference in the rooms standard. I stayed in a premier room which is not the cheap room. It was tired and dated, the bed was very hard. Seemed to be missing basic amenities, items broken. And the bathroom was one of the worst I have ever seen. Not only was it tiny, could hardly move or shut the door, but it was moldy, dirty, cracked and broken. Shower was in the bath and

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Thank you Sam!
desc: We stayed at Penisula excelsior in Singapore for our Honeymoon. The experience didn't start well. The first room wasn't great and the check in neither. Luckily after Sam helped us to change room and his service was absolutely great!

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Very pleasant staycation!
desc: A very wonderful stay at Peninsula Excelsior's Premier Club Room. Nice view with Marina Bay Sands and Singapore Flyers view. And located right beside Funan Mall and opposite Peninsula Plaza and walking distance to Capitol Plaza,Raffles City and Clarke Quay. Super convenient. The stay was made especially enjoyable with exceptional services provided by Sheila and Lana from the Club Lounge. They are always so friendly and welcoming. The breakfast spread at level 5 was great too. The only downside of our stay was the hotel's room door. It was quite scary at night with the door's handle opening sound, as if there's people attempting to come into our hotel room. The sound was so loud and occurred quite often throughout the night. When we opened the door to see if anyone's outside,

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: We stayed at hotel for 5 days to attend MDRT conference. We love Ms.Shiela for helping us a lot .
desc: A true example of excellent hospitality Singapore hotel. We stayed at hotel for 5 days to attend MDRT conference. During our stay at the hotel, the staffs are very friendly and helpful for everything. On our first day of checking in , the service is very fast , they gave us door card and explained well. Hotel GM sent us special welcome letter and also the chocolate box. We felt wonderful and very privileged when Ms Shiela , the Philippine staff delivered us. She gave us excellent service when I went up to sky lounge around 10:45 pm to see night view. She helped us taking beautiful photos and gave very respectful customer service. All the staffs , receptionist, housekeeping , security are all quite helpful to customers and make us happy. We will come back and stay again and

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Perfect 4* hotel
desc: When I was looking for a hotel in Singapore, I wanted something that was central, included breakfast and didn’t break the bank. Peninsula excelsior ticked all the boxes! Firstly, you can’t beat the location - only a 2 minute walk to City Hall Station and plenty of food options close by. We paid a little bit extra for a club room and it was well worth it. Having the evening drinks and canapés was a real treat and remember to ask for a Marina Bay Sands View Room! We needed extra blankets and towels for our kids and they were provided straight away. It’s not a 5* but they don’t proclaim to be so - I think it’s very good value and would definitely stay again.

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Coleman’s cafe staff review
desc: Dining ambience at Coleman’s cafe is great and service staff are all responsive and fun loving. Would like to specifically commend on staff Mr Amim for his excellence service rendered and great hospitality

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Service
desc: Housekeeping provide good service and Nimali is polite and helpful. The location is good and has good view skylines. It is accessible for travel. The sky lounge is beautiful over seeing Singapore landmarks.

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: One of the Finest hotel near Marina bay...
desc: It was a good and pleasant hotel... , House keeping and room service team were all good and especially Mrs.Nimali was very good and caring, And the Breakfast and buffet arrangements were all good...

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Manager Very Impressive
desc: Amin gives us excellent service approachable attentive to us and gives us directions to dishes vvv useful n the dishes are vvv delicious esp the beef randang ..a amicable young man n goes beyond his job scope to please customs ...thk Amin we really enjoy your service ..Will recommend friends n family to dine in ..thks

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Would love to come back here again and again
desc: Had a great experience overall. It’s my second month long stay so that says it all. The housekeeping staff is very helpful and courteous especially Moe. She is so soft spoken and ever so smiling . Does a great job of cleaning . The manager and the 22nd floor staff are absolute sweethearts. Always smiling and welcoming

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: A lovely surprise
desc: I had a good vibe stepping in. My sister was introduced to this lovely place and so she thought it would be a nice place to renege mummy on mummy's 6th death anniversary. I had such a good impression on the c place and people. I was first and foremost warmly welcomed by Albert and then followed by Amin. The rest of the staff were so friendly and they had their broad smiles. Jesinda, Aya, Qureen, Devan, Chef Lewis. These are the people I came across and they did a good job. It's all about the service😊

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Amazing Marina Bay Sands view
desc: I would recommend this hotel to all my friends, if they're looking for best view and strategic location Hotel in Singapore. The services from all the staffs was also amazing. At the Sky Lounge area, there's a staff that made us free drinks & chocolate for us while we were enjoying the view from the rooftop. And my room was clean, and has the best view of Marina Bay Sands. Will definitely comeback. Stayed there for 2 nights and everything was perfect, the location is also a BIG plus for us because this hotel is at the heart of Singapore. And the price is also very affordable!

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Tired and dated glory
desc: Check-in was miserable. Long queues, and they gave me the wrong room. When i complained, they first said "oh, the booking agent didn't specify any room type." I then had my old-school PRINTED version of it, which i showed them, and it DID indeed specify the room, and then they were like "oh... " and only again after i complained to a manager, they DID magically find a new room. The first room smelled dank and rank, was very humid and musty. The new one, after i complained, was a BIT better (yes, they had de-humidifiers in the rooms, but i guess that didn't help much). I reckon that first room hadn't been renovated since 2000 or more. The new one... was "ooooky". The bathroom had a lot of mold between the grouting and around the tub, but otherwise.. room was passable. Still a

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: excellent choice
desc: Was in the Club floor and the launch was excellent. the personnel very attentive and helpful in particular Sheila who gave me excellent tips. Thanks very much to all of them. The only minus was the waiting time for the lifts.

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: The staffs were very friendly and the breakfast buffet was okay.
desc: Overall, everything is okay except the noise outside our room. We had a view from the pool and there were these big fans outside and it makes a little bit noise and you can hear it specially at night when everything is quiet. And I would like to thank AURELIA the room lady that always cleaned our room. She was very friendly and very helpful.

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Major refurbishment programme
desc: I was disappointed, when trying to book a room for late September, to see no mention on the hotel's official website of what I have been told is a major refurbishment programme starting from mid September of both rooms and public areas with works 7 days a week from 9am to 10pm. Poor stuff. Check yourself before you book!

hotelname: Peninsula Excelsior Singapore, A Wyndham Hotel
title: Convenient
desc: Overall stay was OK, here's the recap: Good: staff courtesy, kudos to Housekeeper Ms. Moe, she is very attentive and welcoming. 22 Floor Sky Lounge Team was also very helpful. Thankyou for your excellent service during our stay, you made our stay memorable. Bad: Elevator under maintenance, took 5 minutes to go downstairs which is very time consuming especially while you're in rush.
